20101222010927.000|20101222010929.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED TO HIM.

20101222010953.000|20101222010954.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT IS TRYING TO CRUSH

20101222010957.000|20101222011001.000|CC1|THIS IS THE WIFE OF A           
20101222011001.000|20101222011002.000|CC1|PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE.         
20101222011002.000|20101222011004.000|CC1|ON SUNDAY NIGHT POLICE BEAT AND 
20101222011004.000|20101222011005.000|CC1|LATER ARRESTED HIM AT A         
20101222011005.000|20101222011009.000|CC1|HOSPITAL.
